original_text: Then were there brought unto him little children, that he should put his hands on them, and pray: and the disciples rebuked them.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람들이 예수께서 안수하고 기도해 주심을 바라고 어린 아이들을 데리고 오매 제자들이 꾸짖거늘

sentences.original_text: Then were there brought unto him little children
that he should put his hands on them
